name: LambdaNETCoreDeploy
description: Build and deploy a .NET Core AWS Lambda function.
author: Amazon Web Services

inputs.name: awsCredentials
inputs.label: AWS Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AWS credentials to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'AWSCredentials'

inputs.name: lambdaProjectPath
inputs.label: Path to Lambda Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The relative path to the location of the Lambda project

inputs.name: functionName
inputs.label: Function Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Lambda function to invoke. You can also specify the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the function.

inputs.name: functionRole
inputs.label: Function Role
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the AWS Identity and Access Management Role that provides access to AWS services to the deployed Lambda function.
